itemOffered.name: Power Apps
itemOffered.description: Custom application development using Power Apps, including solutions for Childcare Permitting, Grants Management, Neighborhood Policing, Activity Watch, Legal Case Management Accelerator Data Model, and Asset Repository Management Service.

itemOffered.name: Power Automate

itemOffered.name: Azure
itemOffered.description: Azure cloud services for self-service analytics from Excel Newbie to SQL Server Report Services expert. Reduced reporting inconsistencies. Provide better analytics for decision making. Desktop development.

itemOffered.name: Other Services
